code: import React from"react";import{CurrentUserContext}from"../contexts/CurrentUserContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var card=props.card,onCardClick=props.onCardClick,onCardLike=props.onCardLike,onCardDelete=props.onCardDelete;var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=card.owner._id===currentUser._id;var isLiked=card.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});var cardDeleteButtonClassName="card__delete-button ".concat(isOwn?'card__delete-button_active':'');var cardLikeButtonClassName="card__like-button ".concat(isLiked&&'card__like-button_active');function handleCardClick(){onCardClick(card);}function handleCardLike(){onCardLike(card);}function handleCardDelete(){onCardDelete(card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"card__image",src:card.link,alt:card.name,onClick:handleCardClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,onClick:handleCardDelete,type:"button","aria-label":"\u0423\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0444\u043E\u0442\u043E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__caption",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card__caption-text",children:card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__like-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,onClick:handleCardLike,type:"button","aria-label":"\u041F\u043E\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u044C \u043B\u0430\u0439\u043A",name:"like"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card__like-count",children:card.likes.length})]})]})]});}export default Card;
